title: User Preferences & SEO Improvements
description: Add dark/light mode toggle, newsletter signup, and improve internal linking for SEO

features.title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle
features.description: Theme switcher with system preference detection and persistence

stories.title: Implement theme system with context
stories.description: Create theme provider with localStorage persistence and system preference detection
acceptance_criteria: Theme context provider wraps app with 'light', 'dark', or 'system' modes
Detects system preference using prefers-color-scheme media query
Persists user preference to localStorage
Applies theme class to <html> element for CSS variable switching
No flash of unstyled content (FOUC) on page load
Hook provides current theme and toggle function
Supports server-side rendering without hydration errors
stories.technical_notes: Use React Context + useEffect for localStorage, add script in <head> to prevent FOUC

stories.title: Create light mode color palette
stories.description: Define light mode CSS variables matching neo-brutalist aesthetic
acceptance_criteria: Light mode colors maintain high contrast (4.5:1 minimum)
Background: #F5F5F5 (off-white), Surface: #E0E0E0 (light gray)
Text: #0A0A0A (near-black), Muted: #666666 (dark gray)
Accent color works in both light and dark modes
All components readable and visually consistent in light mode
Hard shadows and thick borders maintained in light mode
Code blocks remain readable with adjusted Shiki theme
stories.technical_notes: Add CSS variables for light mode, create light variant of Shiki theme if needed

stories.title: Build theme toggle UI component
stories.description: Create accessible theme switcher button in header
acceptance_criteria: Toggle button in header with sun/moon icon (or system icon for auto mode)
Three-state toggle: light → dark → system (cycles through)
Shows current theme state clearly
Smooth icon transition animation (respects prefers-reduced-motion)
Keyboard accessible with appropriate ARIA labels
Tooltip showing current mode on hover
Neo-brutalist button styling consistent with design
stories.technical_notes: Client component in Header, use theme context hook

features.title: Newsletter Signup
features.description: Email subscription option for new post notifications

stories.title: Create newsletter signup component
stories.description: Build simple email signup form (mailto link for MVP)
acceptance_criteria: Signup form in footer or dedicated section on homepage
Email input field with validation (basic format check)
Submit button with clear CTA ('Subscribe to Updates')
For MVP: opens mailto link with subject 'Newsletter Signup' and user's email
Alternative: Integrate with simple service (Buttondown, Substack, etc.)
Form accessible with proper labels and error messages
Neo-brutalist form styling with thick borders and clear states
Privacy note explaining email usage (no spam, post notifications only)
stories.technical_notes: Start with mailto, can upgrade to Buttondown/ConvertKit later if needed

features.title: Internal Linking Improvements
features.description: Enhance SEO through strategic internal linking between posts

stories.title: Audit existing posts for internal linking opportunities
stories.description: Analyze 3 existing posts to identify relevant cross-linking opportunities
acceptance_criteria: Review each post for keywords matching other post topics
Identify 2-3 natural linking opportunities per post
Document link anchor text and target post in spreadsheet/doc
Prioritize contextually relevant links over forced connections
Ensure links add value for readers (not just for SEO)
stories.technical_notes: Manual review of content/posts/*.mdx files, create linking-opportunities.md

stories.title: Add internal links to existing posts
stories.description: Update MDX files with identified internal links
acceptance_criteria: Each post has 2-3 internal links to other posts
Links use descriptive anchor text (not 'click here')
Links open in same tab (internal navigation)
Links contextually relevant to surrounding content
Updated posts validate with content validation script
Links tested to ensure correct routing
stories.technical_notes: Edit MDX files, use Next.js Link component or standard markdown links

stories.title: Create internal linking guideline for future posts
stories.description: Document best practices for internal linking in content workflow
acceptance_criteria: Guideline added to .content/brand/voice.md or separate linking-strategy.md
Includes when to link (minimum 2-3 links per post)
Best practices for anchor text selection
Examples of good vs. bad internal links
Added to content validation checklist
Template posts include internal linking reminder

success_criteria: Theme toggle works across all pages without FOUC
Light mode maintains WCAG AA contrast standards
Each post has minimum 2 internal links to related content
notes: Dark/light mode is biggest effort in this epic. Newsletter can be simple mailto for MVP. Internal linking is editorial work, not code-heavy.
